item.description:
Hi Friends,
It's Alexandra from Absolute Yoga. I am one of the organizers of the Plus Size Yoga Meetup.
Unfortunately, my fellow organizer and yoga teacher Annika has been under the weather so we are going to CANCEL the Dec. 4th Meetup just to make sure we can reach people in time.
We hope you can join us for the next Meetup on Friday Jan. 8th at 7pm (posted soon!)

Thank you for understanding and we wish you a wonderful, joyous and healthy holiday season.
Alexandra De Collibus
Absolute Yoga
508-435-3366

group.name: Plus Size Yoga Meetup for Women

item.name: CANCELED Friday night Plus Size Yoga for Women Meetup
